channel.title: Venom(Silabs)
channel.description:
This my silabs compatible I had up and running. Had about 700 character files. Its figment base.
Server Features: [b]*As close to anti-syi as you can get without allowing one IP per connection. If your character has an invalid character in it it gets autobanned and logs your ip, if it does it again, you get IPed. Also made it so if you have a charcter file longer then 13 characters you get auto IPed.
*Stabilized economy as much as I could. Stabilized drops, so you don't get good shit everytime. Removed all half-decent items from shops, and made them monster drops.
*Altered the XP given, made it so it gives a decent amount, so 99 skills are actually worth it. Combat XP is about 350xp per hit.
*Changed the amount of cash given from all cash giving skills.
*Worked with PK timers a little bit, not much.
*Changed godsword specs, they look hella cool now.
*Clean out about 200kbs of client.java, by removing all useless commands, and all the un necessary objects. *Also removed some stuff that couldn't even be done in the server anymore.
*Made woodcutting loop.
*Removed the lame ass godwars cause I thought godsword making was dumb, but I left it in there and case you wanted to have it. All godswords are dropped by member monsters
*Added dagganoth cave. Made dags hit harder have good but infrequent drops.
*Added a multi wildy PK city in Entrana.
*Fixed magic, so ectos are no longer needed.
*Added some commands like ::hidden, ::owner ect. Made the commands already in source work correctly.
*Changed members dungeon completly, and added good dropping NPCs. So members is actually worth it.
*Made barrows monsters hit harder and attack back.
*Made the barrows chest work, only works after key is given by karils after the last teleport.
*Skillcape Emotes.
*More too. Just look. [/b]
Didnt take too many pics but here are the ones I took.
[img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/BarrosRelease.jpg[/img] Cooking Skillcape [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/CookingCape.jpg[/img] [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/Dagrelease.jpg[/img] [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/DefenceCape.jpg[/img] [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/HPCape.jpg[/img] [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/HomeRelease.jpg[/img] [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/MembersRelease.jpg[/img] [img]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/mrarsenist11/PKrelease.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zgtozkftquy]Click Here[/url]
Credits:JaGex, vato
